name: Mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one(CAS Reg. No. 26172-55-4) and 2-methyl-4- isothiazolin-3-one
FoodContactSubstance: Mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one(CAS Reg. No. 26172-55-4) and 2-methyl-4- isothiazolin-3-one (CAS Reg. No. 2682-20-4) at a ratio of 3 parts to 1 part by weight.
